name: Power Attack
player_battle_text: You swing hard at your enemy.
enemy_battle_text: Your enemy swings hard at you.

name: Patch Up
player_battle_text: You apply a bandage to one of your wounds.
enemy_battle_text: Your enemy pauses to bandage one of his wounds.

name: Accumulate
player_battle_text: You flex your muscles, focussing your strength.
enemy_battle_text: Your enemy flexes her muscles, focussing her strength.

name: Break Armor
description: Damage a piece of your enemy's armor to reduce her Defense.
player_battle_text: You aim at a piece of your enemy's armor and swing.
enemy_battle_text: Your enemy sends a blow right for a piece of your armor.
